CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Transition_to_ECSR_Date__c),
(today() - Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(Transition_to_ECSR_Date__c - Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c - 2*( floor((Transition_to_ECSR_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Requested_ECSR_Transfer_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Waiting to Transfer # of Days
